name: Adam Chan Li Hong
briefWorkExperience: Resource Planner with 3.5 years of experience
specialTraining: General Assembly Software Engineering Immersive Bootcamp

showcaseCardPropsList.showcaseDescription: Self Portofolio Built on Next.js and tailwindcss

Built with MERN with Typescript, MusterClass is a web-app that allows users to view various lessons. Features include user signup/login with JWT authentication, subscription plan via Stripe API and view available lessons based on 3 subscription tiers.

A collaborative project with two other team members. Nyna Airlines is a web-based Flight Booking System. Features include ticket booking, flight search and manage booking. Stripe API was integrated to simulate mock payments. This project was built with MERN stack.

summaryStatement: Highly motivated and driven with strong interpersonal skills. Trustworthy and steadfast in my undertakings with a keen eye for detail.
formalEducation: Bachelor's degree on Logistics, Material, and Supply Chain Management

name: Beatric Tan
specialTraining: General Assembly Software Engineering Immersive Bootcamp

showcaseCardPropsList.showcaseDescription: A homework management app for teachers to manage homework collections
A full-stack app for daily day to day expense tracking, built with MongoDB, Mongoose, Express, React, Node and Javascript.
A React web-hosted site that uses API calls to populate a list for you to track and favourite your shows, built with React, Javascript with API calls.

summaryStatement: I was a teacher in MOE for 7 years, teaching not only the mainstream subjects but also coding to the primary school students. I was exposed to coding in a gradual process from block coding to script coding. I fell in love with coding and started self-learning some programming languages. While doing so, I discovered the limitless possibilities of programming and want to explore it in depth. Thus, I took a jump and left teaching for the programming field. I am excited to immerse myself in the world of programming.
